attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if immigarnts want to live in britain they will live by british law and should only have one chance to do so.and it would be a massive step towards tackling britains overcrowded prisons and lets face it why should britain have to deal with other countries criminals? show cameron some courage and get it done brown!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
